授業目的: The purpose of this course is to introduce students to the IELTS exam and to give guidance and practice in understanding and answering the test questions
到達目標:
Students will be able to understand the requirements of each section in the IELTS exam.
Students will be able to respond to comprehension questions.
Students will be able to write a descriptive paragraph about a graph/chart/table and a short opinion essay
特記事項: 2023 年度まで開講の「Skills-based English(IELTS)」との重複履修は不可。
